articles.description: Its new variants are optimised for spreading
articles.content: NATURAL SELECTION is a powerful force. In circumstances that are still disputed, it took a bat coronavirus and adapted it to people instead. The result has spread around the globe. Now, in two indepe… [+7731 chars]
